result.execSummary:
All charges against Israel Guy Wierichs in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Israel Guy Wierichs is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Israel Guy Wierichs

records.addlTxt: 9:00 AM  State moves to dismiss charges upon plea in cases 21CF89 & 22CT88.  Court so orders, dismisses charges.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

9:00 AM Defendant Israel Guy Wierichs in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Israel Guy Wierichs.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.

ADDRESS INFO for Israel Guy Wierichs
Current: 521 Arlington Avenue, Algoma, WI 54201 United States  (Effective: 08-24-2022)
Prior: 138 S Neenah Av, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:18 PM Defendant Israel Guy Wierichs in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Israel Guy Wierichs.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at.  Atty Fagundes has received a global offer from the State, requests a plea date be set in 2 weeks.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Status conference on August 1, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

3:30 PM  Defendant Israel Guy Wierichs appeared by video.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Israel Guy Wierichs.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel, right to prelim.  Defense waives reading of the complaint, waives time limits for prelim. Atty Fagundes requests this case track 21CF89, requests both matters be set for a status in 30 days. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

11:30 AM  Defendant Israel Guy Wierichs appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes appeared by video for Israel Guy Wierichs.  State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond.  Defendant to contact SPD to get counsel appointed in this case.  Return 7/01/22 at 3:30 pm.
